name: VITA (Volunteer Income Tax Assistance) tax preparation (January to April)
description: APACC’s Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Certified staff and volunteers provide free income tax preparation and electronic filing. Service is free.
fullDescription: APACC’s Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Certified staff and volunteers provide free income tax preparation and electronic filing. Service is free.
whatTheyOffer: APACC’s Internal Revenue Service (IRS) Certified staff and volunteers provide free income tax preparation and electronic filing. Service is free.
howToGetIt: To book an appointment, email Kelvin Chan at k.chan@apaccsf.org or Anna Liao at a.liao@apaccsf.org or call 415.587.2689.
